snippet: Southeast Asia has long been divided by language, religion and geography, but on the eve of a regional summit meeting, progress toward establishing a common market is more evident than ever.
abstract: Association of Southeast Asian Nations prepares for high-level meetings, with great ambitions for knitting Southeast Asia together economically; region has long been divided by language, religion, historical rivalries and geography; the opening of Myanmar and construction on the Indochinese peninsula are bringing the region’s nations closer to the goal of standing up to India and China.
lead_paragraph: Southeast Asia has long been divided by language, religion and geography, but on the eve of a regional summit meeting, progress toward establishing a common market is more evident than ever.

headline.main: Wary Neighbors Turn Into Partners in a Quickly Developing Southeast Asia
headline.print_headline: Wary Neighbors Turn Into Partners in a Quickly Developing Southeast Asia

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
